verses.verse: So <S%G3779><s%> Of Us <S%G2248><s%> Let Reckon <S%G3049><s%> A Man <S%G444><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> Attendants <S%G5257><s%> Of Christ <S%G5547><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Stewards <S%G3623><s%> Mysteries <S%G3466><s%> Of God's. <S%G2316><s%>

<S%G3739><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> As To The Rest, <S%G3063><s%> It Is Required <S%G2212><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Stewards <S%G3623><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Faithful <S%G4103><s%> One <S%G5100><s%> Be Found. <S%G2147><s%>

<S%G1698><s%> <S%G1161><s%> But To Me <S%G1519><s%> The Smallest Matter <S%G1646><s%> It Is <S%G2076><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> ' By <S%G5259><s%> You <S%G5216><s%> I Be Examined, <S%G350><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> By <S%G5259><s%> Man's <S%G442><s%> Day. <S%G2250><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> Neither <S%G3761><s%> Myself <S%G1683><s%> Do I Examine. <S%G350><s%>

<S%G3762><s%> For Of Nothing <S%G1063><s%> In Myself <S%G1683><s%> I Am Conscious; <S%G4894><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> By <S%G1722><s%> This <S%G5129><s%> Have I Been Justified : <S%G1344><s%> <S%G3588><s%> But He Who <S%G1161><s%> Examines <S%G350><s%> Me The <S%G3165><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Is. <S%G2076><s%>

So That <S%G5620><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Before The <S%G4253><s%> Time <S%G2540><s%> Anything <S%G5100><s%> Judge, <S%G2919><s%> <S%G2193><s%> Until <S%G302><s%> May Have Come <S%G2064><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> Who <S%G3739><s%> Both <S%G2532><s%> Will Bring To Light <S%G5461><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Hidden Things <S%G2927><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Darkness, <S%G4655><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Will Make Manifest <S%G5319><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Counsels <S%G1012><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Hearts; <S%G2588><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Then <S%G5119><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Praise <S%G1868><s%> Shall Be <S%G1096><s%> To Each <S%G1538><s%> From <S%G575><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%>

<S%G5023><s%> Now These Things, <S%G1161><s%> Brethren, <S%G80><s%> I Transferred <S%G3345><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Myself <S%G1683><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Apollos <S%G625><s%> ' On Account Of <S%G1223><s%> You, <S%G5209><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Us <S%G2254><s%> Ye May Learn <S%G3129><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Above <S%G5228><s%> What <S%G3739><s%> Has Been Written <S%G1125><s%> , To Think, <S%G5426><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> One <S%G1520><s%> For <S%G5228><s%> <S%G3588><s%> One <S%G1520><s%> Ye Be Puffed Up <S%G5448><s%> Against <S%G2596><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Other. <S%G2087><s%>

<S%G5101><s%> For Who <S%G1063><s%> Thee <S%G4571><s%> Makes To Differ? <S%G1252><s%> <S%G5101><s%> And What <S%G1161><s%> Hast Thou <S%G2192><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Thou Didst Not Receive? <S%G2983><s%> <S%G1487><s%> But If <S%G1161><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Thou Didst Receive, <S%G2983><s%> Why <S%G5101><s%> Boasted Thou <S%G2744><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Having Received? <S%G2983><s%>

Already <S%G2235><s%> Satiated <S%G2880><s%> Ye Are; <S%G2075><s%> Already <S%G2235><s%> Ye Were Enriched; <S%G4147><s%> Apart From <S%G5565><s%> Us <S%G2257><s%> Ye Reigned; <S%G936><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> I Would <S%G3785><s%> Surely <S%G1065><s%> Ye Did Reign, <S%G936><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> We <S%G2249><s%> You <S%G5213><s%> Might Reign With. <S%G4821><s%>

<S%G1380><s%> For I Think <S%G1063><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Us <S%G2248><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Apostle <S%G652><s%> Last <S%G2078><s%> Set Forth <S%G584><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> Appointed To Death. <S%G1935><s%> For <S%G3754><s%> A Spectacle <S%G2302><s%> We Became <S%G1096><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> World, <S%G2889><s%> Both <S%G2532><s%> To Angels <S%G32><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To Men. <S%G444><s%>

We Are <S%G2249><s%> Fools <S%G3474><s%> On Account Of <S%G1223><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> <S%G5210><s%> But Ye <S%G1161><s%> Prudent <S%G5429><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Christ; <S%G5547><s%> We <S%G2249><s%> Weak, <S%G772><s%> <S%G5210><s%> But Ye <S%G1161><s%> Strong; <S%G2478><s%> Ye <S%G5210><s%> Glorious, <S%G1741><s%> <S%G2249><s%> But We <S%G1161><s%> Without Honour. <S%G820><s%>

To <S%G891><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Present <S%G737><s%> Hour <S%G5610><s%> Both <S%G2532><s%> We Hunger <S%G3983><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Thirst. <S%G1372><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> , Are Naked, <S%G1130><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Are Buffeted, <S%G2852><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Wander Without A Home, <S%G790><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Labour, <S%G2872><s%> Working <S%G2038><s%> <S%G3588><s%> With Our Own <S%G2398><s%> Hands. <S%G5495><s%> Railed At, <S%G3058><s%> We Bless; <S%G2127><s%> Persecuted, <S%G1377><s%> We Bear; <S%G430><s%>

Evilly Spoken To, <S%G987><s%> We Beseech : <S%G3870><s%> As The <S%G5613><s%> Refuse <S%G4027><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> World <S%G2889><s%> We Are Become, <S%G1096><s%> Of All The <S%G3956><s%> Off Scouring <S%G4067><s%> Until <S%G2193><s%> Now. <S%G737><s%>

Not <S%G3756><s%> Shaming <S%G1788><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> Do I Write <S%G1125><s%> These Things, <S%G5023><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> Children <S%G5043><s%> My <S%G3450><s%> Beloved <S%G27><s%> I Admonish You. <S%G3560><s%>

<S%G1437><s%> For If <S%G1063><s%> Ten Thousand <S%G3463><s%> Tutors <S%G3807><s%> Ye Should Have <S%G2192><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> ' Yet <S%G235><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Many <S%G4183><s%> Fathers; <S%G3962><s%> <S%G1722><s%> For In <S%G1063><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Through <S%G1223><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Glad Tidings <S%G2098><s%> I 1473 P-1NS You 5209 P-2AP Did Beget. 1080 V-AAI-1S
I Exhort <S%G3870><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> You, <S%G5209><s%> Imitators <S%G3402><s%> Of Me <S%G3450><s%> Become. <S%G1096><s%>

On Account Of <S%G1223><s%> This <S%G5124><s%> I Sent <S%G3992><s%> To You <S%G5213><s%> Timothy, <S%G5095><s%> Who <S%G3739><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> Child <S%G5043><s%> My <S%G3450><s%> Beloved <S%G27><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Faithful <S%G4103><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> Who <S%G3739><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> Will Remind Of <S%G363><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3598><s%> My Ways <S%G3450><s%> That Are <S%G3588><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> According As <S%G2531><s%> Everywhere <S%G3837><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Every <S%G3956><s%> Assembly <S%G1577><s%> I Teach. <S%G1321><s%>
As To <S%G5613><s%> <S%G3361><s%> Not Coming <S%G2064><s%> Now <S%G1161><s%> My <S%G3450><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> Were Puffed Up <S%G5448><s%> Some; <S%G5100><s%>

<S%G2064><s%> But I Shall Come <S%G1161><s%> Shortly <S%G5030><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> You, <S%G5209><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Will, <S%G2309><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> I Will Know, <S%G1097><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Word <S%G3056><s%> Of Those Who <S%G3588><s%> Are Puffed Up, <S%G5448><s%> But <S%G235><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Power. <S%G1411><s%>

What <S%G5101><s%> Will Ye? <S%G2309><s%> With <S%G1722><s%> A Rod <S%G4464><s%> I Should Come <S%G2064><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> You, <S%G5209><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Love <S%G26><s%> <S%G4151><s%> And A Spirit <S%G5037><s%> Of Meekness? <S%G4236><s%>
